# passwordsafe_safe_datasource (Data Source)

Safe Datasource, gets safes list.

## Example Usage

```terraform
// safes_list
data "passwordsafe_safe_datasource" "safes_list" {
}
output "safes_list" {
  value = data.passwordsafe_safe_datasource.safes_list.safes[0].name
}
```
